00030 #define GHInteger(n) [NSNumber numberWithInteger:n]
00031 
00032 #define GHStr(fmt, ...) \
00033 [NSString stringWithFormat:(fmt), ## __VA_ARGS__]
00034 
00035 #define GHDict(key, ...) \
00036 [NSDictionary dictionaryWithKeysAndObjectsMaybeNil: key, ## __VA_ARGS__, nil]
00037 
00038 #define GHCGRectToString(rect) NSStringFromRect(NSRectFromCGRect(rect))
00039 #define GHCGSizeToString(size) NSStringFromSize(NSSizeFromCGSize(size))
00040 #define GHCGPointToString(point) NSStringFromPoint(NSPointFromCGPoint(point))
00041 
00042 #define GHAssertMainThread() NSAssert([NSThread isMainThread], @"Should be on main thread")
00043 
00044 // Default epsilon for float comparisons
00045 #define GH_EPSILON 1.0E-5
00046 
00047 #define GHProperties(obj, ...) [[obj dictionaryWithValuesForKeys:[NSArray arrayWithObjects:__VA_ARGS__, nil]] description]
00048 
00049 // Makes it easier to generate descriptions
00050 // - (NSString *)description {
00051 //   return GHDescription(@"prop1", @"prop2", @"prop3");
00052 // }
00053 #define GHDescription(...) \
00054 [NSString stringWithFormat:@"%@ %@", \
00055   [super description], \
00056   [[self dictionaryWithValuesForKeys:[NSArray arrayWithObjects:__VA_ARGS__, nil]] description] \
00057 ]
